name: Jill of the Jungle 2: Jill Goes Underground
name_original: Jill of the Jungle 2: Jill Goes Underground
description:
Jill of the Jungle 2: Jill Goes Underground is an arcade game developed by Epic MegaGames. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Epic MegaGames. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Jill of the Jungle 2: Jill Goes Underground is available on PC.
